de.gianfelice.aeskulab.system.persistence
Interface DBCommunicator

All Known Implementing Classes:
JPACommunicator
public interface DBCommunicator

Interface which defines the methods needed for a database communication. The responsibilities of classes, which inherit this interface, are to connect to the database and manage the objects which are stored to or deleted/fetched from the database.

Version:
1.1.3
Author:
Kim (http://code.google.com/p/vaadin-appfoundation), Matthias Gianfelice

refresh

<A extends PersistentObject> void refresh(A object)
Update all the fields in the entity to the most up-to-date version of data found in the database. Any changes made to the entity object before calling this method will be overwritten.

Type Parameters:
A - The type of object
Parameters:
object - The entity object you wish to refresh

close

void close()
Close the facade. Closes the connection.

kill

void kill()
Kill the facade, closes the facade and removes all possible references.
